description: The user will be shown an image of Mahatma Gandhi and a link to a video, they have to go to a location and scan a QR Code pasted there.

questions.title: Link
questions.description: The user will be given an image of Mahatma Gandhi and this link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ITI1CnFv2A , they have to go to a location and scan a QR Code pasted there.
questions.answer: The user will have to scan the QR Code pasted inside room 313 in MGR.
